column1: '''Boars''' were aggressive tusked beasts common to woodland regions. The most famous of all the boars of [[Middle-earth]] was the great [[Boar of Everholt]]
column2: that lived beneath the trees of the [[Firienholt|Firien Wood]]. This boar was hunted by King [[Folca]] of [[Rohan]]
column3: and though he eventually killed his quarry
column4: the King was mortally wounded in the encounter.<ref>{{App|Mark}}

column1: :Boars are found in many places of Middle-earth
column2: especially in the [[Bree-land]]. They are typically not aggressive
column3: but will fight if the player threatens them.
